article_title: Utah Proposes Tax On The Sick To Pay For Obamacare Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.description: Utah's new “assessment” on medical providers to help fund Obamacare Medicaid expansion is a new Obamacare tax on the sick that will not only raise health care costs for all Utahns, but add significantly to the national debt.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
